jobs.description: Tata Consultancy Services Limited is a multinational IT company. Having offices across 46 countries.  TCS has 400k+ employees worldwide earning 20 billion $+ as annual revenue, here I work as a software engineer where I develop web applications for various clients.

Linguaden is a cloud based digital platform startup company to learn foreign languages ONLINE & LIVE, I worked for them as a freelance web developer I developed their entire web app including online learning portal
Xaprika is an online food delivery startup based in Siliguri, India, I worked for them as a freelance web developer, I designed and developed their entire website and android app.
